articles.title: US, allies gallop ahead in advanced chips, leaving China foundries stuck behind - South China Morning Post
articles.description: The chip gap between China and the West is likely to widen as the US and its allies forge ahead with leading-edge projects while mainland Chinese foundries are stuck at mature nodes due to US export controls.
articles.content:
Published: 11:00pm, 22 Nov, 2022
Updated: 12:28am, 23 Nov, 2022
